system_description: ContosoShop – React SPA front-end with REST API in Azure App Service + SQL back-end + Service Bus for transaction decoupling.
issue_summary: Customers are intermittently unable to complete purchases due to transaction timeouts.

conversation_history.message: Several customers have reported that their orders fail to complete, with a timeout error displayed on checkout.
Thank you for reporting this. Can you confirm if this is affecting all users or only specific segments?
It seems random, but we noticed a spike in failed transactions over the last hour. No pattern by device or location.
We are escalating this to engineering and will update you as soon as we have more information.
